## ConfigurableProductOptions.product\_id property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> `product_id` is not needed and can be obtained from it's parent
> 

This is the same as a product's id field

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
product_id?: Maybe<Scalars['Int']>;
```
